sentence.Network_en: Enthusiasts say their timeless appeal is largely down to their cuteness.
sentence.Network_cn: 热衷者说它们永恒的吸引力很大程度上是依赖于他们的娇小可爱.

sentence.Network_en: With a combination of womanly beauty and childlike cuteness, Marilyn Monroe's charm was great.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛丽莲·梦露有着成熟女性的美丽,又有着孩子般的可爱, 她魅力无比.
